root: ^My coworker %FullName:NPC:1% tells me %Pron:1:1% is calling out sick to work today to go to an amusement park.
^%Pron:1:1% tells me I should call out sick as well. What should I do?
^Don't call out sick, go to work.

res1: ^%FullName:NPC:1% is alright with this and I go to work but I feel like I missed out.

^I am somewhat glad I worked, since I was able to earn some money. But I can't help feeling like I missed out on an opportunity to spend some time with %FullName:NPC:1% at an amusement park and %Pron:1:1% seemed to have so much fun. I was just afraid that work would catch on if we both called out sick.
res2: ^I go to the amusement park and have a great time and no one at work is suspicious at all!

^Me and %FullName:NPC:1% have such a fantastic day together, we really start to connect a lot. And I was afraid we would both get caught if we both called out sick but no one at work suspected a thing. Sure, I didn't make money and instead spent money at the amusement park, but I think it was absolutely worth it!
global decl: ^%Pron:1:1% tells me I should call out sick as well. What should I do?
